/usr/bin/c++     CMakeFiles/renderer_gpu_bitonic.dir/src/main_gpu.cpp.o CMakeFiles/renderer_gpu_bitonic.dir/src/gpu.cu.o CMakeFiles/renderer_gpu_bitonic.dir/src/bitonic_sort.cu.o  -o ../renderer_gpu_bitonic   -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/stubs  -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/8  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLX.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so -lglfw -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
